forms.description: IRS Form W-2, also known as a 'Wage and Tax Statement'
forms.usage: Employees use the information on their Form W-2 to prepare their tax returns (Form 1040)

forms.description: Tax form specific to the US territory of Guam
forms.usage: Used to report income and pay taxes to the Guam Department of Revenue and Taxation

forms.description: Tax form specific to the US territory of Puerto Rico
forms.usage: Used to report income and pay taxes to the Puerto Rico tax system

forms.description: IRS form used to report certain payment transactions
forms.usage: Taxpayers report 1099K income on Schedule C of their federal Form 1040 tax return

forms.description: IRS form used to report nonemployee compensation
forms.usage: Used for reporting self-employment income or income from independent contractor jobs

forms.description: Canadian tax form known as the Statement of Remuneration Paid
forms.usage: Used to report earnings and tax withholdings to the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA)

forms.description: Canadian tax form used to report income for completing personal income tax return
forms.usage: Information on the RL-1 slip is used to complete the personal income tax return (TP-1-V)

forms.description: Provincial year-end form primarily used for reporting retirement income and Quebec income tax withheld
forms.usage: Used for reporting retirement income, annuity income, and Quebec income tax withheld

forms.description: Corrected version of the W2 form
forms.usage: Used when an employee needs to correct their W2 form

forms.description: Form that includes information about health insurance coverage offered by an employer
forms.usage: Used for reporting health insurance coverage to the IRS

forms.description: Tax form specific to the US territory of Saipan
forms.usage: Used to report income and pay taxes to the local government

forms.description: IRS form used to report the distribution of retirement benefits
forms.usage: Used for reporting pension and annuity distributions

forms.description: IRS form used to report miscellaneous compensation
forms.usage: Used for reporting rents, prizes, awards, healthcare payments, and payments to an attorney

forms.description: IRS form used to report certain payment transactions
forms.usage: Taxpayers receive this form to report payment transactions
